name: Elite Jet Center at Contact
about: Elite Jet Center at Contact, located at Oakland County International Airport (KPTK) in Waterford, Michigan, offers exceptional Executive Class FBO services with some of the lowest full-service jet fuel prices in America. Our facility features spacious passenger and pilot lounges, ramp-side access, and comprehensive amenities including aircraft ground service, avionics and airframe maintenance, catering, and ground transportation options. We provide flight instruction under FAR Part 61, with a fleet of three Cessna 172s and competitive hourly rates. Our Part 145 Repair Station and Avionics Service Center ensure all your aircraft needs are met. With a commitment to safety and customer service, our NATA Safety 1st trained staff ensure a seamless and comfortable experience for all clients. Join us for unparalleled service and competitive fuel prices.
